title: How would you define the year 2020 in one paragraph? - Quora

response.answer_text: One of the most trying years I have witnessed in my very comfortable life. Even when there's chaos all around, I can still say I am privileged and immensely blessed. Days seem to topple like dominoes and we don't know where it's all going to end. But as cliche as it sounds, life goes on and on. We'll adapt, we'll grow we'll modify ourselves because we're resilient. 2020 so far has reinforced the extremely uncertain nature of life.
